scripts.deploy:dev: PREFIX=development CLOUDFRONT_ID=EIYX001DGGQK8 ENV=dev pnpm run ci-deploy-skeleton
scripts.ci-deploy-skeleton: ENV=${ENV} VITE_APP_SHA=${GIT_HEAD:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)} VITE_APP_VERSION=$(node -pe 'require("./package.json").version') pnpm run build:dev && aws s3 sync build/ s3://telemed.ottehr.com --region us-east-1 --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ${CLOUDFRONT_ID} --paths '/*' --region us-east-1
